titles.title: There Shall Be Showers of Blessing

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Showers of blessing,
Showers of blessing
we need:

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Mercy-drops round us
are falling,
But for the showers
we plead.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
There shall be showers
of blessing:
This is the promise
of love;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
There shall be seasons refreshing,
Sent from the Saviour above.

verse.name: v2a
v2b
verse.lines:
Over the hills
and the valleys,
Sound of abundance
of rain.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
There shall be showers
of blessing:
Send them upon us,
O Lord;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Grant to us now
a refreshing,
Come and now honor
Thy Word.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
There shall be showers
of blessing:
Oh, that today
they might fall,

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Now as to God
weâ€™re confessing,
Now as on Jesus we call!
